placeholderImages.description: Integrate the user standing naturally and clearly visible in front of a pristine Formula E GenBeta car (as provided at https://p.turbosquid.com/ts-thumb/5t/vBs1Ff/bp/screenshot/jpg/1718371194/1920x1080/fit_q87/cc94c9797f2224013b9ca9450512c15bc5458157/screenshot.jpg) on the grid of the Mexico City E-Prix, with the vibrant track markings and grandstands visible behind them. The car's details should be in sharp focus, and there should only be one car.

Create a 1/6 scale commercialized figurine of a me as a Formula E driver in a full race suit (without the helmet), performing a celebratory pose (e.g., arms raised, fist pump) in a realistic style, in a Formula E pit garage environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is the ZBrush modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations of the driver and their car.

Edit the background to show the user posing confidently with a Formula E car (as provided at https://p.turbosquid.com/ts-thumb/5t/vBs1Ff/bp/screenshot/jpg/1718371194/1920x1080/fit_q87/cc94c9797f2224013b9ca9450512c15bc5458157/screenshot.jpg)Â in the unique indoor section of the London E-Prix at ExCeL, with the car's sleek lines and electric glow highlighted against the track.
Driving a Formula E car on the surface of Mars.
A dynamic, anime-style action shot of a Formula E car drifting.
Celebrating a win on the podium in Monaco, champagne spraying.
A pit stop scene with a futuristic female mechanic.
